text: Sutaram se yakhana sunale tadera phandira katha, se tadera deke pathale ebam tadera jan'ya tairi karale gadira asana, ara tadera madhyera pratyekake dile ekati kare churi, ara balale -- ''beriye esa edera samane.’’ Atahpara tara yakhana tamke dekhala tamke bhabalo atulaniya, ara nijedera hata kete phelala o balalo -- ''allah‌ra ki nikhumta srsti! E to manusa naya, e to eka mahimannita phiris‌ta.’’
